languages.text:
"Пока ты ожидаешь, я себе
Позволю скуку отогнать сонетом".

traits.locale_text:
"Пока ты ожидаешь, я себе
Позволю скуку отогнать сонетом".
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."
languages.original_text:
"Пока ты ожидаешь, я себе
Позволю скуку отогнать сонетом".

traits.locale_text: "Your wait will test your patience and my own. To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text: "Your wait will test your patience and my own. To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text: "Your wait will test your patience and my own. To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
“你的等待，对你我而言等同忍耐。
为了打发时间，我将吟诵诗篇。”
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
“你的等待，对你我而言等同忍耐。
为了打发时间，我将吟诵诗篇。”
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
「流れる時間は君の忍耐と僕の忍耐を試すだろう。
ソネットを詠み、時間を潰そう」
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
「流れる時間は君の忍耐と僕の忍耐を試すだろう。
ソネットを詠み、時間を潰そう」
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
«Tu espera pone a prueba tu paciencia y la mía.
Para pasar el tiempo, un poema entonar me gustaría».
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
«Tu espera pone a prueba tu paciencia y la mía.
Para pasar el tiempo, un poema entonar me gustaría».
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
« Bien longtemps encore vous pouvez attendre.
Peu importe, j'ai des sonnets à revendre. »
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
« Bien longtemps encore vous pouvez attendre.
Peu importe, j'ai des sonnets à revendre. »
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Euer Warten wird Eure Geduld strapazieren, die meine auch.
Daher zum Zeitvertreib ein Sonett, so ist es Brauch."
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
"Euer Warten wird Eure Geduld strapazieren, die meine auch.
Daher zum Zeitvertreib ein Sonett, so ist es Brauch."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Bekleyişin, ikimizin de sabrımızı ziyadesiyle ölçecek.
Zaman geçirmek için dudaklarımdan bir sone dökülecek."
languages.original_text:
"Your wait will test your patience and my own.
To pass the time, a sonnet I'll intone."

traits.locale_text:
"Bekleyişin ikimizin de sabrımızı ziyadesiyle ölçecek.
Zaman geçirmek için dudaklarımdan bir sone dökülecek."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
